KCG | Chicago | C++ Developers | FULL-TIME (ONSITE)

We're looking for two experienced, modern C++ developers at KCG to work on our automated trading system in Chicago:

* C++ Engine Developer: http://chk.tbe.taleo.net/chk06/ats/careers/requisition.jsp?o...

* C++ Simulation Developer: http://chk.tbe.taleo.net/chk06/ats/careers/requisition.jsp?o...
